name: FLAT (Cheeseness, SteelRaven7, Johannesmp, antonriehl)
description:
Fight your way through your corrupted brethren to face the Pulse Dragon and free your people from its influence.

FLAT is a short first person, ice skating combat game with unique movement mechanics, initially made for the 7 Day FPS Challenge in 2012 by SteelRaven7, Cheeseness, and Johannesmp, with music by Anton Riehl.

Aim/Shoot

  • Look around using the mouse or Left and Right cursor keys.
  • Fire using the left mouse button, the X key or the Up cursor key.

Movement

  • Hold down the W key and alternate between the A and D keys to build momentum and skate forwards. Hold down the S key whilst doing the same to skate backwards.
  • Pressing the Space bar when traveling at speed will jump. Pressing the Space bar whilst leaning with the A or D keys will dodge sideways.

Other

  • Press the Q key or the H key to use a healthkit and restore all health.
  • Number keys 1, 2, and 3 will switch between weapons (when you have them).
  • Press the Esc key to pause the game.
  • Press F1 to toggle mouse grab.

FLAT's source code is available under the GPL, and it has been ported to the Open Pandora handheld gaming console.
